info.title: PictoPy
info.description: The API calls to PictoPy are done via HTTP requests. This backend is built using FastAPI.

post.description: Enable AI tagging for multiple folders.
Disable AI tagging for multiple folders.

delete.description: Delete multiple folders by their IDs.

post.description: Sync a folder by comparing filesystem folders with database entries and removing extra DB entries.

get.description: Get details of all folders in the database.
Get all images from the database.

put.description: Rename a face cluster by its ID.

get.description: Get metadata for all face clusters including face counts.
Get all images that contain faces belonging to a specific cluster.

GetClusterImagesData.title: GetClusterImagesData
GetClusterImagesData.description: Data model for cluster images response.

GetClusterImagesResponse.title: GetClusterImagesResponse
GetClusterImagesResponse.description: Response model for getting images in a cluster.

GetUserPreferencesResponse.title: GetUserPreferencesResponse
GetUserPreferencesResponse.description: Response model for getting user preferences

ImageInCluster.title: ImageInCluster
ImageInCluster.description: Represents an image that contains faces from a specific cluster.

UpdateUserPreferencesRequest.title: UpdateUserPreferencesRequest
UpdateUserPreferencesRequest.description: Request model for updating user preferences

UpdateUserPreferencesResponse.title: UpdateUserPreferencesResponse
UpdateUserPreferencesResponse.description: Response model for updating user preferences
